The code chunk is part of the `_doAnalysisGen` method in a Python class, which handles the analysis and aggregation of frame profiling data. This specific section deals with processing aggregated profiles when certain time conditions are met, ensuring that the profile data is correctly moved to higher-period aggregations and managing the log schedule accordingly.

nextIndex = pi + 1
                    if nextIndex >= len(self._logSchedule):
                        # if we're adding a new period to the end of the log period table,
                        # set it to double the duration of the current longest period
                        nextPeriod = period * 2
                        self._logSchedule.append(nextPeriod)
                    else:
                        nextPeriod = self._logSchedule[nextIndex]
                    if nextPeriod not in p2ap:
                        p2ap[nextPeriod] = p2ap[period].getReference()
                    else:
                        p2ap[nextPeriod].aggregate(p2ap[period])
                    # this profile is now represented in the next larger profile
                    # throw it out
                    p2ap[period].release()
                    del p2ap[period]
